field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below. Then, to look up the author name from a controlled list of authors, with or without an ORCID, click the magnifying glass.

field.label: Author's email
field.hint: Enter the email address of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter a main title for this item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Degree Awarded
field.hint: Degree Awarded

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Embargo Date
field.hint: If an embargo period applies to this item, please enter a date to indicate when the embargo will expire

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below. Then, to look up the author name from a controlled list of authors, with or without an ORCID, click the magnifying glass.

field.label: Author's email
field.hint: Enter the email address of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Author's Uni ID
field.hint: Enter the author's Uni ID

field.label: Author's Affiliation
field.hint: Enter the author's name and affiliation

field.label: Editors
field.hint: Enter the names of the editors of this item below. Then, to look up the author name from a controlled list of authors, with or without an ORCID, click the magnifying glass.

field.label: Provenance (eg link to Sherpa/Romeo entry)
field.hint: Enter the associated open access rights

field.label: Copyright
field.hint: Add copyright owner below

field.label: Access Rights
field.hint: Indicate if the item is Open Access

field.label: License
field.hint: Enter the license for use (i.e. Creative Commons License (Attribution 4.0 International))

field.label: Rights or License URL
field.hint: Enter the URL for information about the license (i.e. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/)

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of this item below (i.e. journal article title, book chapter title, report title, etc)

field.label: Book Title
field.hint: If the item is a book chapter, enter the title of the book below

field.label: Electronic access or address of the source document (usually a hyperlink)
field.hint: Enter the source URI of this item below

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: If the item has an ISSN please enter the value below.

field.label: ISBN
field.hint: If the item has an ISBN please enter the value below.

field.label: Submitter's Uni ID
field.hint: Submitter's employee number: u123456789
field.required: We need to know who submitted here.

field.label: Publication Version
field.hint: The document's publication Version.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: Please give the date of publication, or public distribution, below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.hint: If known.

field.hint: If known.

field.hint: If known.

field.label: Physical format
field.hint: Size, page numbers, etc. Use a separate entry for each.

field.hint: If known.

field.hint: If known.
